name: Santa's Gift Grab
description:
Santa Gift Grab: Step into a snowy world with our straightforward collector's game. Featuring clean low-poly graphics and soothing Christmas tunes, your task is to help Santa gather his misplaced gifts. But be quick! Time is running out. Can you collect them all?

Features:
• 3 Levels - Play through 3 levels with increasing difficulty.
• Cookies - Collect cookies to ensure you don't run out of time.
• Gifts - Gather all of Santa's gifts to complete each level.
